name: web-texture-tool
description: Utility to efficiently handle loading of a wide variety of texture formats

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run build-webgl && npm run build-webgpu && npm run copy-workers
scripts.copy-workers: copyfiles -u 2 src/workers/* build/workers && copyfiles -u 2 src/workers/**/* build/workers
